title: Nicki Minaj Talks About Her Beliefs and Politics
summary: Nicki Minaj, a famous rapper, surprised people by speaking at a conservative event in Arizona. She talked about her support for President Donald Trump and Vice President JD Vance, calling them role models. Nicki was interviewed by Erika Kirk, whose husband Charlie Kirk was being remembered at the event. Nicki explained that she likes Trump and Vance because they have heart and soul, and she feels proud of them. She also made fun of California Governor Gavin Newsom by using a nickname. Nicki said she is tired of being pushed around and thinks it's important to speak your mind, even if others disagree. She believes that people should use their minds more. Erika Kirk thanked Nicki for being brave, and Nicki said they are too busy building things to worry about critics. Nicki is from Trinidad and is known for songs like 'Super Freaky Girl' and has been nominated for Grammy awards.
